## Uploading the file "trgn599.clinical.tsv":
```{R}
clinical_data <- read.table("trgn599.clinical.tsv", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
```


## Calculate the mean, median, standard deviation, variance and mode of the following variables: "weight", "height", "days_to_birth"

## Using Weight
```{R}
#Create a vector using the variable "weight"
x <- clinical_data$weight
```

#Calculating the mean
```{R}
mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
```

#Calculating the median
```{R}
median(x, na.rm = TRUE)
```

#Calculating the Standard Deviation
```{R}
sd(x, na.rm = TRUE)
```

#Calculating the variance
```{R}
var(x, na.rm = TRUE)
```

#Calculating the mode
```{R}
# Creating a function named "getmode"
getmode <- function(x) {
  uniqx <- unique(x)   
  uniqx[which.max(tabulate(match(x, uniqx)))]}

#Create a vector using the variable "weight"
x <- clinical_data$weight
x <- x[!is.na(x)]

# Calculating the mode
calculating_mode <- getmode(x)
calculating_mode
```
